amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to establishing a biennial budget resolution process.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 932 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 932 proposed by Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S1981-1982; text: CR S1981) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to establishing a biennial budget resolution process.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 932 proposed by Senator Cochran.
